SEARCH
Module com.staticconstants.flowpad.flowpad
Package com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea

Class HyperlinkSegment

java.lang.Object
com.staticconstants.flowpad.frontend.textarea.HyperlinkSegment
All Implemented Interfaces:
RichSegment
public final class HyperlinkSegment extends Object implements RichSegment
A RichSegment implementation representing a hyperlink.

Displays styled, underlined text that can be clicked to open a URL. Also supports context menu editing and basic styling via TextStyle.
